articles.content: OnePlus Nord 2 CE launch : Chinese brand OnePlus is said to add new smartphone i.e.  OnePlus Nord 2CE in company’s Nord series. Reportedly, the smartphone may get launched in March 2022. Ahead of it’… [+750 chars]
